description.Display: A 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display with rounded corners and True Tone technology.
description.Processor: Powered by the A12 Bionic chip, offering strong performance for its time.
description.Camera: A 12MP wide-angle rear camera with advanced Portrait Mode and a 7MP front TrueDepth camera for selfies and facial recognition.
description.Security: Fast and secure Face ID for authentication.
